alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 2:12PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. Visibility one half mile or less at times. East winds gusting to 45 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...From noon Saturday to 6 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drift will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds are expected to increase on Saturday causing blowing snow with low visibility over Dalton Highway Summits. Falling snow is not expected, but there are many inches of new snow that fell over the past several days that will blow easily.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
